content: To a stirred slurry of NaBH4 (0.005 mol, 0.19 g) in THF (40 mL), hynca (0.01 mol, 1.88 g) was gradually added with the immediate evolution of hydrogen gas during which a yellow suspension occurred. The reaction mixture was then set to stir at reflux for overnight. The solvent was removed in vacuo yielding a yellow solid. Single crystals suitable for X-ray measurement for complex 1 were obtained from water–pyridine (1:2) solution at room temperature over a period of 30 days. Yield, 85% (based on NaBH4); (LC-MSD): m/e 406.5 (M+-pyridine), 383.5 (M+-Na-pyridine). 1H NMR (d6-DMSO, 298 K, TMS): δ (ppm): 7.37–7.43 (m, 5H), 7.50 (t, J = 7.36 Hz, 2H), 7.62 (t, J = 7.43 Hz, 2H), 7.80 (t, J = 8.21 Hz, 2H), 7.89 (d, J = 8.16 Hz, 2H), 8.21 (d, J = 8.28 Hz, 2H), 8.56 (d, J = 4.07 Hz, 2H). 13C NMR (d6-DMSO, 298 K, TMS): δ 108.5, [O2CC], 118.2, 123.2, 123.9, 124.7, 125.2, 125.6, 127.6, 128.7, 136.2, 136.7, 149.5, 156.9 [CH(O)], 164.1 (CO2). Selected FT-IR (ν/cm−1): 3363 (w), 3060 (s), 1922 (w), 1688 (s), 1625 (w), 1574 (w), 1512 (w), 1442 (s), 1396 (s), 1354 (w), 1296 (w), 1215 (w), 1135 (s), 1043 (s).
clean_text:
Synthesis of Complex (1)

To a stirred slurry of NaBH4 (0.005 mol, 0.19 g) in THF (40 mL), hynca (0.01 mol, 1.88 g) was gradually added with the immediate evolution of hydrogen gas during which a yellow suspension occurred. The reaction mixture was then set to stir at reflux for overnight. The solvent was removed in vacuo yielding a yellow solid. Single crystals suitable for X-ray measurement for complex 1 were obtained from water-pyridine (1:2) solution at room temperature over a period of 30 days. Yield, 85% (based on NaBH4); (LC-MSD): m/e 406.5 (M+-pyridine), 383.5 (M+-Na-pyridine). 1H NMR (d6-DMSO, 298 K, TMS): δ (ppm): 7.37-7.43 (m, 5H), 7.50 (t, J = 7.36 Hz, 2H), 7.62 (t, J = 7.43 Hz, 2H), 7.80 (t, J = 8.21 Hz, 2H), 7.89 (d, J = 8.16 Hz, 2H), 8.21 (d, J = 8.28 Hz, 2H), 8.56 (d, J = 4.07 Hz, 2H). 13C NMR (d6-DMSO, 298 K, TMS): δ 108.5, [O2CC], 118.2, 123.2, 123.9, 124.7, 125.2, 125.6, 127.6, 128.7, 136.2, 136.7, 149.5, 156.9 [CH(O)], 164.1 (CO2). Selected FT-IR (ν/cm-1): 3363 (w), 3060 (s), 1922 (w), 1688 (s), 1625 (w), 1574 (w), 1512 (w), 1442 (s), 1396 (s), 1354 (w), 1296 (w), 1215 (w), 1135 (s), 1043 (s).
